Author: redhotjillypepper
Text: I told someone this like a month ago, but dont look at it like a streak thats dead once you "break" it.  Think of it as a score! So, lets say last month you went 31/31 days without purging. This month, your score for April is 29/30. Think about that! That's still SO great! thats not a failure! thats progress!   Dont give up on yourself. No shame in a stumble. You've come so far and you are so far from square one!

Author: bhbubeepy
Text: hey, please don't look at this as a complete setback. you still went two months without purging, and that's incredible! one day doesn't undo all the progress you've made as long as you keep fighting from now on. you've proven to yourself that you're capable of not purging for a long time, use that as motivation to continue! recovery doesn't have to be linear, it's normal to make mistakes because it's such a drastic life change.
